@usedefaults
@@title Virtual Machine: ${name}
{{vmachine: id:$$id}}

{% if status != "DESTROYED" %}

{{include:vmachine_actions}}

{% endif %}

h2. Virtual Machine: ${name}

|*ID*| $$id|
|*Description*| ${descr}|
|*Tags*| ${tags}|
|*Stack*| [${stackname}|stack?id=${stackId}]|
|*Account*| [${accountName}|account?id=${accountId}]|
|*Cloudspace*| [${spacename}|cloud space?id=${cloudspaceId}]|
|*Created at*| ${createdat}|
|*Deleted at*| ${deletedat}|
|*Size*| ${size}|
|*Image*| ${image}|
|*Status*| ${status}|
|*Host Name*| ${hostName}|
|*Hypervisor Type*| ${hypervisortype}|

h3. NICs
${nics}

h3. Disks
||Name||Size||Backend Size||Type||Path||
{%for disk in disks -%}
|${disk.name}|${disk.sizeMax} GiB|${ disk.footprint + " GiB" if disk.footprint else "N/A" }|${disk.type}|${disk.referenceId}|
{% endfor %}

h3. Virtual Machine Status Details
|*Status*|${stats_state}|
|*Ping*|${stats_ping}|
|*HardDrive Test*|${stats_hdtest}|
|*Last Checked*|${stats_epoch}|

h3. Machine Exports
{{vmexports machineid:$$id}}

h3. Machine Snapshots
{{snapshots machineid:$$id}} 

h3. Machine History
{{machinehistory machineid:$$id}}

h3. Machine PortForwarding Rules
{{machinePortForwarding machineid:$$id}}
